Name: NobleEscape
About the game: NobleEscape is the ultimate story based, puzzle, escape room game out there. You start the game with one end goal; Escape the room to save your life! Not only will you need to escape the room, but you need to avoid multiple obstacles along the way. Along the escape room journey, you'll also meet new people that need you to complete tasks which earn you revenue which is crucial to see you survive the 'escape room'. In NobleEscape, we use a dynamic and fully custom Randomly Generated World that will make you have the best possible experience ever. The Random System we use means that each player can have their own, special experience when playing. Everyone's experience of our game is different. Our all new game will offer you hours of fun and give you the best possible experience when playing. As we're developing our game further, we enhance the experience and will hopefully add more features. Features: Full story Randomly generated world Earn-able coins in game to spend in shop Enemy AI Tasks to complete within level Hard and easy challenges Various randomly generated enemies Lots of other features
